name: Oscar
overview: Oscar is a platform game that was released on Amiga, Amiga CD32, and MS-DOS in 1993, and on SNES in 1996. It was developed and published by Flair Software. The first CD32 version was bundled with the CD32 console on the same disc as the puzzle game Diggers. The player controls a character named Oscar through seven Hollywood-themed levels collecting Oscars. This version is the NTSC stand-alone version.
